history.proof: intros. sfirstorder use: mult_lt_power_2_4' unfold: is_cipher_of.

exceptions.tactic: intros q l H0 H1 i j Hi Hj.
intros q' l H0 H1 i j Hi Hj.
intros q' l' H0 H1 i j Hi Hj.
intros q' l' H0 H1 i' j Hi Hj.
intros q' l' H0 H1 i' j' Hi Hj.

exceptions.exn: In environment H6 : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m < p -> n < p H4 : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m < p -> n < p P : nat -> nat -> Prop l, q : nat Hr : 1 < q -> 4 <= power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2 b, c : nat -> nat eq1 : ∑ l (fun i : nat => b i * power (power (S i) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2)) * ∑ l (fun i : nat => c i * power (power (S i) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2)) = ∑ l (fun i : nat => b i * c i * power (power (S (S i)) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2)) + ∑ l (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => (b i * c j + b j * c i) * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2))) Hbc_1 : forall i : nat, i < l -> b i * c i < power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2 i, j : nat H : i < l H0 : j < l H1 : l + 1 < q H3 : forall i : nat, i < l -> c i < power q 2 H5 : forall i : nat, i < l -> b i < power q 2 X, X0, X1, X2, X3, X4 : Prop Unable to unify "4 <= power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2" with "P (b i * c j + b j * c i) (power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2)".

original: intros q l H0 H1 i j Hi Hj. unfold lt in Hi, Hj. apply Nat.lt_lt_add_l with (m:=i) in Hj. rewrite Nat.add_0_r in Hj. apply Nat.add_lt_mono_r in Hj. apply Nat.lt_le_pred in Hj. apply Nat.le_lt_trans with (m:=l) in Hj. apply Nat.lt_trans with (m:=j) in Hj. apply Hr. auto.
